preferences.title: Preferences Settings

single.label: Single Tenant
single.description: No multi-tenancy. Single database, no filtering. Default mode.

shared_db.label: Shared Database
shared_db.description: Multi-tenancy with shared database. All data in one database, filtered by team_id.

separate_db.label: Separate Databases
separate_db.description: Multi-tenancy with separate databases. One database per tenant for maximum isolation.

info.configNote: Tenancy mode is configured via the TENANCY_MODE environment variable. Changes require server restart.

warning.title: Important
warning.message: Changing tenancy mode requires database migrations and may affect existing data. Always backup your database before making changes.
